Chapter Previous

class gstTransformedBoundingSphere : public gstBoundingVolume

A class that implements a bounding sphere bounding volume implementation for use by the PHANToM. This implementation keeps a representation of the bounding volume in both local and world coordinates. The world coordinate representation is kept up to date automatically and is used to optimize the checking of whether the PHANToM is within the focus of the owning haptic object.

From header file: gstTransformedBoundingSphere.h

Functions
CloneBoundSphere Cloning function.
getRadius Accessor for setting the radius of the bounding volume.
getSphere Get the normal bounding sphere representation of the bounding volume.
getSphereLocal Get the local coordinate representation of the bounding volume.
getSphereWC Get the world coordinate representation of the bounding volume.
setRadius Accessor for setting the radius of the bounding volume in local coordinates.
setSphereLocal Set the local coordinate representation of the bounding volume.
setSphereWC Set the world coordinate representation of the bounding volume.
Virtual Functions
CloneCloning function.
asSphereGet the bounding volume of the correct type.
getCenterAccessor for getting the center of the bounding volume.
getDistanceWCA method to get to closest distance from point to the bounding sphere.
setCenterAccessor for setting the center of the bounding volume in local coordinates.
testLineIntWCA method to determine if the line segment specified by startPt and endPt intersects the bounding volume.
updateA method to update the world coordinate representation of the bounding sphere based on the local representation and translations, rotations and scales from the world coordinate system.
